title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When clicking on 'Close all saved' option, the files are not always closed.
EB: It should close all the saved files without any errors or exceptions.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open multiple files in the application.
2. Make some changes in the files.
3. Save the changes.
4. Click on 'Close all saved' option.
